Item.Name: SyntaxEditor
Item.Caption: Syntax Demo
Item.Description: Syntax Demo shows ability of Editor.NET to highlight syntax of various programming languages.
Item.Note: We developed a set of parsers for most commonly used modern programming languages, including C, C#, Delphi, Xml, Html, Perl, etc. Some of these parsers are extended to support automatic code completion, code outlining, smart formatting, and syntax error underlining.
